name: Warden (itch) (deanfam)
description:
You are the Warden of a prison. Keep your prisoners under control in order to increase profits. Use your funds to expand your prison, and use whatever means necessary to keep control of it.

  • Keep an eye on the attributes of each of your prisoners to prevent deaths, escapes, or worse.
  • Manage where you assign your prisoners to prevent their attributes from getting too high.
  • Track how the prisoners in each cell affect the dynamic of the entire block.
  • Every turn, more prisoners arrive, mixing things up and potentially altering your strategies.
  • Choose which prisoners to assign to cells based on how much income they'll provide.
  • Earn enough money to have an epic party!

Programming by Avery Dean

Graphics/Music/Slamming Noise by Ness "Nesteropolis Casino" Arps

Beta-tested by Andrew "Dad" Dean
